HERO.SUBTITLE: Manage RFQs, compare supplier quotes and decide faster — all in one place. Over

PAIN.TITLE: Sound familiar?
PAIN.ITEM_1_DESC: You call, email, wait for responses. Every project starts from scratch.
PAIN.ITEM_2_DESC: Excel spreadsheets, emails, different formats. How do you know what's the best price?
PAIN.ITEM_3_DESC: Procurement takes weeks when work should already be underway.

HOW.TITLE: How it works
HOW.SUBTITLE: Three simple steps to better prices
HOW.STEP_1_DESC: Enter job description or upload a file (PDF, DWG, IFC). AI analyzes and identifies stages automatically.
HOW.STEP_2_DESC: System matches your project with suitable suppliers and sends RFQs automatically.
HOW.STEP_3_DESC: Get all quotes in one place, compare prices and terms, pick the best contractor.

FEATURES.TITLE: Everything you need
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Powerful tools for construction procurement
FEATURES.F1_DESC: Over 500 verified construction companies across Estonia. Search by category and location.
FEATURES.F2_DESC: Professional templates with all important details. Send requests with one click.
FEATURES.F3_DESC: All quotes in one view. Compare prices, deadlines and terms side by side.
FEATURES.F4_DESC: Upload PDF, DWG or IFC file. AI identifies construction stages, quantities and materials automatically.
FEATURES.F5_DESC: See instantly if quote matches market rate. Don't overpay.
FEATURES.F6_DESC: AI sends RFQs to all suitable suppliers. You focus on building.

PRICING.TITLE: Simple and transparent pricing
PRICING.SUBTITLE: Start free, upgrade when needed
PRICING.PLAN_FREE_DESC: For getting started and small projects
PRICING.PLAN_PRO_DESC: For active builders and small companies
PRICING.PLAN_ENTERPRISE_DESC: For large construction companies and developers

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.A1: Describe your construction project or upload a file (PDF, DWG, IFC). Our AI analyzes the project, identifies work stages and finds suitable suppliers. We send RFQs automatically and collect quotes in one place.
FAQ.A2: Yes! The free plan allows up to 3 projects and 10 RFQs per month. It's suitable for smaller projects. For higher volume, use Pro or Enterprise plans.
FAQ.A3: We support PDF, DOCX, TXT documents, AutoCAD DWG/DXF drawings, BIM/IFC models and images (JPG, PNG). AI analyzes the file and identifies construction stages automatically.
FAQ.Q4: How fast do I get quotes?
FAQ.A4: RFQs are sent immediately after project creation. Quotes typically start arriving within 24-48 hours, depending on supplier response times.
FAQ.A5: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption (SSL/TLS) and GDPR-compliant data processing. Your projects and business information are confidential.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to start?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Join over 500 construction companies already using BuildQuote.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: AI-powered construction procurement platform. Find the best contractors, get the best prices.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.INTRO_TEXT: Welcome to BuildQuote! These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of the AI-powered construction procurement platform provided by BuildQuote OÜ ("we", "us"). By using the platform, you agree to these terms.
TERMS.USAGE_TEXT: The platform is designed for managing construction procurement, sending RFQs, and comparing quotes. You agree to use the platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You may not use the platform in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the platform or other users.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_TEXT: To create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for the security of your account, including maintaining the confidentiality of your password. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.
TERMS.LIABILITY_TEXT: BuildQuote provides the platform on an "as is" basis. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or punitive damages. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you have paid us in the last 12 months.
TERMS.DATA_TEXT: We process your personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your data. More details are available in our Privacy Policy. The legal basis for data processing is contract performance and our legitimate interest in providing the service.
TERMS.CHANGES_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by email at least 30 days in advance. Continued use of the platform after changes take effect constitutes your agreement to the new terms.
TERMS.CONTACT_TEXT: For questions, contact us at kristo.erte@gmail.com. BuildQuote OÜ, Estonia.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.COLLECTION_TEXT: We collect data you provide directly (name, email, company, phone) and data generated through platform usage (project information, RFQs, quotes). We also collect technical data such as IP address, browser type, and visit statistics.
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_TEXT: We use your data to provide and improve the service, send and manage RFQs, communicate with you regarding your account, and ensure platform security. Data is not used for automated decision-making without your consent.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to: access your data and obtain a copy; rectify your data; delete your data ("right to be forgotten"); restrict data processing; port your data; object to data processing; withdraw consent. To exercise your rights, email kristo.erte@gmail.com.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: We use essential cookies for platform operation (session, language preference). Analytics cookies are used only with your consent. You can change cookie settings in your browser.
PRIVACY.SHARING_TEXT: We share your project data only with suppliers to whom you send RFQs. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. Data may be shared with law enforcement authorities when required by law.
PRIVACY.RETENTION_TEXT: We retain your data as long as you have an active account. After account closure, we delete your personal data within 30 days, unless we have a legal obligation to retain it longer.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: For data protection questions, contact us at kristo.erte@gmail.com. BuildQuote OÜ, Estonia. You have the right to file a complaint with the Estonian Data Protection Inspectorate (www.aki.ee).

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Building the future of construction procurement.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: BuildQuote was created to make the construction procurement process simpler and more transparent. We believe that with technology and AI, we can help construction companies find the best contractors, save time, and make smarter decisions. Our platform connects clients with suppliers, automates the RFQ process, and provides market price verification.
ABOUT.TEAM_TEXT: We are a small and passionate team from Estonia that combines construction and technology experience. Our goal is to create the tool we wished we had when managing construction projects.
ABOUT.CONTACT_TEXT: We are always happy to hear feedback, suggestions, and questions.
